channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: The Lighthouse Express
item.description: On Minnesota's North Shore, a vintage railroad takes passengers back to the past.

item.title: Troll-hunting in Mount Horeb
item.description: A little town near Madison wins friends with a mix of old and new attractions.

item.title: Dreaming of Ely
item.description: The wilderness around this north-woods town exerts a magnetic pull on city folk.

item.title: Adventure on the Gunflint Trail
item.description: For outdoorsy folks, this wilderness in northeast Minnesota is a year-round playground.

item.title: A roof in the woods
item.description: In state and county parks and forests around the Upper Midwest, visitors love their camper cabins.

item.title: Autumn in the studios
item.description: On fall art tours, treasure hunters strike gold.

item.title: On budget in a dorm
item.description: In summer, college residence halls are a boon to budget travelers.

item.title: Cruising into fall
item.description: For lovely views of the hues, try a float on a boat.

item.title: 10 cool ways to see fall colors
item.description: When the trees put on a show, get a front-row seat that can't be beat.

item.title: Autumn in the Brainerd Lakes
item.description: In fall, this lake-resort area is a hideaway in plain sight.

item.title: Fall in Door County
item.description: On this peninsula in Lake Michigan, autumn colors gild a much-loved landscape.

item.title: 15 great fall views
item.description: From these easy-to-reach overlooks, see rolling waves of color light up the landscape.
